Question: In January 1997, pictures of this person touring an Angolan minefield in a ballistic helmet and flak jacket were seen worldwide.
Hints: This person moved to London in 1978 and lived in her mother's flat, as her mother then spent most of the year in Scotland.
In the same year, this person became President of the British marital advice organisations, which she ended in 1996.
Through her grandmother, Lady Cynthia Hamilton, this person is a distant relative of the Dukes of Abercorn.
